title: Fibonacci Sumsets and the Gonality of Strip Graphs
authors: David Jensen and Doel Rivera Laboy
abstract:
We provide a new perspective on the divisor theory of graphs, using additive
combinatorics. As a test case for this perspective, we compute the gonality of
certain families of outerplanar graphs, specifically the strip graphs. The
Jacobians of such graphs are always cyclic of Fibonacci order. As a
consequence, we obtain several results on the additive properties of Fibonacci
numbers.
